summary: This document is a memorandum from a Human Resource Manager at MCC New York regarding the restriction of an individual to the first floor. It instructs the recipient to sign and issue the memo, have the restricted individual sign three copies, and place notifications in Control about restrictions for two individuals.

persons.name: Human Resource Manager MCC New York
persons.context: The author of the memorandum, issuing instructions regarding the restriction of an individual to the first floor and notification procedures.

keyFacts: An individual is being restricted to the first floor of a facility, likely the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The restriction requires formal documentation with the individual signing three copies of the memorandum.
Notifications must be placed in 'Control' regarding restrictions for two individuals, indicating a formal institutional procedure.
The document originates from the Human Resource Manager at MCC New York, suggesting it relates to inmate or staff management.
